iso_eternal_unity_in_multiplicity.definition: Isomorphic patterns on eternal unity in multiplicity (extending Spinoza's Ethics to collective scales) capture structural equivalences in participatory hierarchiesâ€”mappings where infinite modes, relational affects, collective empowerments, and eternal harmonies preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include modal multiplicities, generous integrations, regenerative unities, and participatory necessities vs. isolative contingencies, validated via 2025 studies (e.g., Spinoza-AI ethics per Medium Jun 2025/web:10; collective empowerment per MDPI 2025/web:11) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., neural fellowships to AI open-source models per web:11 analogies). Hard-to-vary invariants like regenerative striving enable forecasts of unified collectives; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm eternal unity/deny scarcity/both in multiplicities/neither in isolations); scores >0.98 based on 2025 participatory abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to unity-multiplicity-empowerment overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from Spinoza/web and participatory contrasts (e.g., divine modes to AI collectives).
Validate coverage; flag participatory gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., cosmic unity links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., regenerative unities); integrate diachronic depth (primordial modes to 2025 AI collectives).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

items.description: Diverse expressions of eternal essence; modes map invariantly (e.g., infinite attributes to diverse AI contexts per web:10/11).

examples.structure: Infinite attributes express eternal essence in multiplicities
Multiplicities map to varied user contexts in AI collectives

mappings.principle: Modal striving for diverse eternal expression.

items.description: Interconnected affects fostering collective well-being; relations map invariantly (e.g., joyful affects to AI social enhancements per web:10/11).

examples.structure: Affects as power transitions in fellowship
Affects map to collective AI optimizations

items.description: Sharable powers propagating unity; regenerations map invariantly (e.g., divine participation to open-source AI per web:11).

examples.structure: Empowerments map to regenerative AI networks

mappings.principle: Regenerative striving for eternal collective unity.

gaps: Participatory divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm eternal unity/deny scarcity/both in multiplicities/neither in isolations.
